news.title: Novo Nordisk shares plunge 20% after Wegovy maker names new CEO, cuts full-year guidance
news.summary: Danish pharmaceutical giant Novo Nordisk on Tuesday named its new CEO. The company cut its full-year sales and profit guidance. Novo Nordic also cut its sales and profits guidance for 2014.

news.title: Bessent, Warsh, Hassett are the leading contenders to get Fed chair job, CNBC survey finds
news.summary: A virtual three-way tie to replace Fed Chair Jerome Powell as Fed chair when his term expires. It's a virtual three -way tie for the job. Powell's term expires in 2018.

news.title: Apple opens manufacturing academy in Detroit as Trump ramps up pressure to invest in U.S.
news.summary: The Apple Manufacturing Academy is opening in downtown Detroit, with a focus on artificial intelligence. The academy is expected to be open by the end of the year.

news.title: Boeing slashes losses as CEO touts 'our turnaround year'
news.summary: Boeing slashed its quarterly losses as sales jumped after it delivered the most airplanes since 2018. Boeing slashes quarterly losses as sales jump after it delivers the most airplane since 2018 and delivers the most ever.

news.title: Cash App opens up to Apple Pay and Google Pay for the first time
news.summary: PayPal’s Venmo continues to gain ground, reporting more than 20% year-over-year revenue growth in the second quarter.

news.title: 3 reasons why the stock market is on the brink of losing 5%-10% — and what to do now
news.summary: What could go wrong? Cautious insiders, euphoric investors and seasonal weakness. What could go right? Shareholders, traders and analysts weigh in on what they think is going wrong.

news.title: The stock market’s worst month is coming up. Should you sell in August?
news.summary: September typically is a loser. August’s return depends on the index you track. September is the worst month for the S&P 500.

news.title: Home prices post smallest increase in nearly two years, offering buyers a reprieve
news.summary: Home prices in the 20 biggest metros in the U.S. continued to slow. The housing market weakened under the weight of high mortgage rates and increasing unaffordability.

news.title: IMF lifts U.S. growth outlook on lower tariffs and upbeat markets
news.summary: The factors holding it up are viewed as temporary. While global growth is seen as resilient, the factors holding up growth are seen as short-term.

news.title: Trade deficit sinks to 22-month low as businesses try to time Trump tariffs. GDP to get boost.
news.summary: The nation’s trade deficit in goods sank 11% in June to a 22-month low. U.S. companies grappled with on-again, off-again Trump tariffs.
